attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIqc4RvnuazsiRsZC2p_itemcontent
attribs.current: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LIqcdNmKfbSDhG0zRWb_description
attribs.current: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet o f you as if it w ere bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades o f gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LIqcpqIzYboiZrFzfwA_description
attribs.current: Hobgoblins are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LIqgtH2zTlM7JZJowd1_description
attribs.current: You are proficient with two martial weapons of your choice and with light armor.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIqiLPUALpsKgevF-tR_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Slashing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LIqiPFP9uEXLh8b6lKV_name
attribs.current: Simple Weapons, Hand XBow, Heavy Crossbow, Pike, Glaive

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIqiU2X4vmZjpsBSAaN_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Bludgeoning, Range: 20/60

attribs.current:
Includes:

 a backpack

 a crowbar

 a hammer

 10 pitons

 10 torches

 a tinderbox

 10 days of rations

 a waterskin

 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I work hard so that I can play hard when the work is done

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards. (Lawful)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Ruthless pirates murdered my captain and crew-mates, plundered our ship, and left me to die. Vengeance will be mine.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I cant help but pocket loose coins and other trinkets I come across.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LIqmtL52ySJQzgBkDbh_spelltarget
attribs.current: One object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LIqmtL52ySJQzgBkDbh_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LIqmtL52ySJQzgBkDbh_spelldescription
attribs.current: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn which spell created it. If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn what spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LIqmvimlMl559NLQvCO_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. If you sense magic in this way, you can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic, if any. The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LIqn5VSwc3nSR9D9T-g_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 1st level, you can infuse your weapon with a powerful magic. As a bonus action, you can infuse a weapon you are holding, causing it to burst into ethereal flames.
The first time you hit an attack with that weapon before the end of your next turn, it deals an additional 1d6 force damage, and the infusion ends.
This damage increases by 1d6 at 5th level Artificer (2d6), and again at 11th level (3d6) and 17th level (4d6). When attacking with an infused weapon, you can use you Intelligence modifier in place of your strength or dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIv7n23o3SyXCvZkk12_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LIv7rAD8ZGt7YBZbY1b_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LJ-YJhq7Po26d21UoSt_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d10, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LKT6hhkFFJlrFFRxkbs_description
attribs.current: Starting at 2nd level, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses any of the tool proficiencies you gain from this class.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7DsMhW4KQYi27oht_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7DsMhW4KQYi27oht_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to five falling creatures within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7DsMhW4KQYi27oht_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A small feather or piece of down

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7DsMhW4KQYi27oht_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creatures rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7Gti4DFzgO44Pe93_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the Healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7Gti4DFzgO44Pe93_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LKT7Kp7qyPHKfi58Izd_spelldescription
attribs.current: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell doesnt protect the warded creature from area effects, such as the explosion of a fireball. If the warded creature makes an attack or casts a spell that affects an enemy creature, this spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKT9Bl9xJmZcE5AOLGs_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKT9Bl9xJmZcE5AOLGs_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d10, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 100/400

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current: Participated in the slaying of the golden demon

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LL7nY8KsM5yYd7JxjS5_itemcontent
attribs.current: Half plate consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It does not include leg protection beyond simple greaves that are attached with leather straps.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LL7oHZ66M0lPMQW1YGH_description
attribs.current: You infuse powerful magic into a non-magical ring. You can use this ring to cast the shield spell without expending a spell slot. You cannot use this ring to cast the spell again until you complete a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LL7pnmFN5uaERkc3ijR_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to channel your artificer spells 
into a non-magical item for later use.
At the end of a short or long rest, pick a spell you know. You can infuse this spell into an item for later use. You must expend any components the spell requires, but this does not expend a spell slot. Subsequently, any creature holding the item with an Intelligence of 6 or higher that is aware there is magic infused in it can expend the stored magic and cast the spell.
The spell uses your spellcasting modifiers, but is in all other ways treated as if the creature holding it cast the spell. The magic infused in the item fades if you complete a short or long rest without expending the stored spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LL7qDjcwKagwtRnQrKb_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature. The creatures jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.
